The "Contact Directory" provides essential contact information for gambling regulators and support services in Australia. This directory includes federal and state regulators, support services, and industry bodies, offering a comprehensive resource for individuals seeking assistance or information related to gambling regulation and support.

== Federal Regulators ==

=== Australian Communications and Media Authority (ACMA) ===
The ACMA is responsible for regulating online gambling and ensuring compliance with the Interactive Gambling Act 2001.
